column1: Local Foods////We stayed near the Local Foods on Dunstan while helping my family for a few weeks post-Harvey.  There are so many great places to eat in Houston
column2: yet most nights we opted to come back to Local Foods for the relaxed atmosphere
column3: the lovely staff and most of all for the delicious food.  We enjoyed everything we tried: the salads
column5: the avocado toast ($5!) with freshly ground pepper and salt (would love a couple of poached eggs with it)
column6: etc.  But my obsession was with the Chicken Posole Soup...I could eat it every day.  Thankfully
column7: the manager gave me the recipe which I used over the holidays
column8: making some new converts in NYC.  I wish we had a Local Foods near us!
